hiveArticle.title: BWPhotoContest : Theme #animals - Lion, 2nd Entry
hiveArticle.body:
# <center> Namaste, Have a great day everyone</center>

### <center> This is my 2nd entry for the BWPhotoContest organized by @daveks</center>

<hr>
